text: Víctor Limba (born 6 October 1947) is a former Argentine cyclist. He competed in the sprint event at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Argentina Category:Cyclists at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Pan American Games medalists in cycling Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Argentina Category:Cyclists at the 1971 Pan American Games
title: Víctor Limba
